DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to estimate the relative bioavailability and food effect of a PF-03882845 tablet as compared to a suspension formulation used in previous clinical studies.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-03882845 Absorption In Healthy Volunteers Given Orally As Tablet Versus Suspension Formulations And Effect Of Food On Its Absorption
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years,Females must be of nonchildbearing potential. Body mass index of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2. Subjects who are willing and able to comply with all scheduled visits, treatment plan, laboratory tests, and other study procedures. Serum potassium >5 mEq/L at screening. Impaired kidney function (estimated GFR <60 mL/min/1.73 m2). History of sensitivity to eplerenone, spironolactone, or related compounds.
